reviews.review: This game is fun to play with friends. I would say that if you can play with friends, go for it. The balance is not always the greatest, but that comes with any PVP character based game.

I don't even know what to say other than I've been playing this game for years now. Sometimes it gets super frustrating due to bugs or certain peoples playstyles and you HAVE to take a break for your sanity's sake. However, when that happens I ALWAYS come back to have fun.

Eu gostei do jogo, na verdade comprei mais por pressão dos amigos, joguei ele por umas 3 horas e já consegui perceber que o jogo em si é bem divertido sim, mesmo com toda a temática de terror, o que mais deixa o jogo legal, é você jogar com amigos, se você quiser jogar sozinho não vai ter a mesma graça, por isso aconselho você ter amigos que joguem isso com você, porque jogando sozinho eu percebi que to carente

I want to play a game...

Above you lies the key to your salvation from boredom. A cat and mouse chase like no other. Here you will play the role of vicious stalker or frantic citizen to your heart's content. The tool needed to reach your goal is located in your back pocket. 

Live or die. Make your choice.

Asynchronität die überzeugt!
Wer mehr als 300 Spielstunden in ein Spiel steckt und es dann schlecht rezensiert hat masochistische Züge oder eine zu kurze Lunte. Zugegeben, wer schnell dazu tendiert in einem Spiel zu tilten oder zu ragen wird hier viel Raum für Frust haben. Alle anderen erwartet ein spannendes Katz- und Mausspiel.
Bugs nimmt man mit Humor, toxische Mitspieler erfordern Zen.

it is a really fun game and its even more fun when running a custom game and chatting with your friends on discord. each round you get rewarded with bloodpoints which help you get perks for your characters and even if you lose a round you will still be rewarded with a good amount of points so their is no reason to sweat and ruin other peoples experiences.
Muy entretenido, el juego tiene una ambientación increíble, si buscas asustarte habra momentos que el juego lo lograra, pero realmente opino que el fuerte del juego es mantenerte tenso.
It's fun I guess

Survivors are toxic.
Killers are toxic.
My friends are toxic. 
My mom is toxic.
I'm toxic.

If you can get past some of the players being pretty juvenile/toxic, it can be a very fun game. I am very fond of DbD, and it's the only real online multiplayer game that has held my attention. It's really easy to get distracted by other people's negativity, and it affects us all but there's sweet people who play this game and I love it.
Really fun game to play with your friends. Lots of interesting killers, etc!
Divertido para jugar con amigos o sólo. Algunos bugs que se pueden resolver pero la mecánica es jugable.

Prinzipiell eine Spielempfehlung - wenn nicht diese ständigen Bugs wären. 
Und die Tatsache, dass mir jedes Mal massig Punkte flöten gehen, weil sich das Spiel wieder aufhängt oder abstürzt!
Technisch ist das ganze eine Katastrophe - da sollte mal lieber Geld rein investiert werden, anstatt ständig neue DLC´s zu veröffentlichen (die meistens dann auch nicht funktionieren oder das Spiel noch weiter belasten)

Auch die Updates mit ihren "Bugfixes" sind ein Witz: erfahrungsgemäß läuft es nach jedem Update bei mir schlechter. 

Die Community ist sauer und das zu recht!
Ein so gutes Spiel mit oft guter Gruppendynamik (Arschloch-Spieler wird man da leider immer finden) wird am Ende zu einem Kampf gegen die Technischen Probleme. 
Wenn man z.B. ständig dem Killer ins Messer läuft, weil man plötzlich auf einem ganz anderen Teil der Map auftaucht... Sowas muss doch nicht sein, oder?

This game is DEAD BY DEVELOPERS because they killed it. JUST PUT A FUCKING ANTI CHEAT. Make it like valorant so it has kernel level access to your computer IDGAF what people think or if they want there privacy, if you want to play a game now and days you better be prepared to sacrifice your time and sanity to playing a game like this. It used to be so good. I came back after over a year of not playing and my first game on had someone speed hacking. I USED TO BE TOP 1% OF NURSE AND HUNTRESS now i am just a former shell of what I used to be and so is this game. JUST DELETE, ITS NOT WORTH IT. JUST LET THIS GAME DIE. Thats obviously what the devs want too.

还不错，就是画质和恐怖感能不断增强就必然会是经久不衰的经典作品了，生动感还不够还不能做到如同吃鸡那样让玩家有种融入其中的刺激感所以这个游戏玩起来并不是很有恐怖感


Not bad, if the picture quality and sense of horror can be continuously enhanced, it will inevitably be an enduring classic work. The vividness is not enough, and it can’t be done like eating chicken, so that the player has a kind of excitement into the game atmosphere. The game is not very scary


good

Honestly, dead by daylight is a fun game but there are lots of things that ruin the game fast. The killer can just camp you which ruins the game and makes you frustrated and they added barely any penalty for it so there is nothing keeping you from camping to win. The bugs in the game are really annoying and can ruin many matches along with all the exploits that there is for the game. The overall effort for events has dropped to just copy and pasted garbage with new skins here and there and the game is really grindy and can be boring when you start out. The match making of this game is TRASH and you get people who are veterans of this game getting pared up with new players which causes the new players to leave. This game could be fun to the right people but it gets boring and really frustrating quickly, not only that but it takes forever to find a match so most of the game is just you sitting in the menu till you find a match. #DeadByBoycott

La comunidad es toxica como la del lol, es poco new friendly.

Las skins son bonitas.

3/10.

And if none of your friends are online.. well I guess you can be the killer. ;)

Dead by daylight est un jeu d'horreur assez sympathique qui propose régulièrement du nouveaux contenus 
beaucoup de personnages et tueurs proviennent de film et qui ont traumatiser plusieurs génération sont présent sur le jeu et nous permet de les incarnés (Freddy Krueger, Ghostface ou encore Michael Myers) ce qui rend le jeu tout aussi intéressant. il y a environ une nouveauté tout les 3 mois 

Certe il existe un système de battle pass qui permet de récupéré des skins ou des amulettes. Une partie du BP est gratuit et l'autre est payante ( coûte 1000 cellules d'aura soit environs 10 € ) mais si vous le finissez complètement, vous gagner autant de cellules d'aura qu'il vous à coûté ce qui est pratique.

A ideia e a mecânica do jogo são boas, porém é extremamente desbalanceado, se você é sobrevivente esteja pronto pra passar raiva, não existe balanceamento nenhum nas partidas, é um killer mais idiota que o outro, como esse novo ai, bicho corre e joga shuriken, além de ter uma roupa de freefire de imbecil, o spawn dos sobreviventes é outra coisa estupida, você nasce praticamente pagando um bola gato pro killer. Entrar no armário faz barulho, arrumar gerador faz barulho, andar deixar rastro, basicamente, se você pudesse peidar no jogo, o Killer saberia. Enfim, se você quiser comprar o jogo, esteja certo de jogar só como Killer ou só com um grupo de amigos fechados.
im loveing the game

I love this game, this game is the best a-symmetrical horror in the market currently. So you might be wondering why I didn't recommend it? The game is going downhill, and it's going downhill quickly. They've completely given up on balancing the game, they have started focusing on skins and chapters instead of fixing bugs, fixing characters, ect. The game is poorly optimized, and I think that if we don't do anything, such as not buying chapters or skins, they're not going to fix any of the problems. It's been 6 years and they haven't added much extra to the base game.. They have NEVER added a new mode, nor a new non-event related feature. Extremely disappointed in how this game is going.
